name: Bralem_Mopak
content: Bralem Mopak was a Nimbanel male criminal and trader. Mopak ran an operation on Arbra, holding the resident Hoojibs in cages and selling them to other criminal groups and individuals so that the beings—who most assumed to be simple animals—could be forced to spy on his targets and send intelligence back to Mopak on Arbra. Mopak's operation was brought to an end when the Hoojibs, led by Plif and assisted by the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca, escaped and fought back against the Nimbanel. He was taken prisoner by the crime lord Jabba the Hutt, who had lost out on a deal with Zikk Keradd because of Mopak.
